criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Windows Update device driver search prompt' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Disable Guest Account
metadata.description: The built-in guest account must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Accounts: Guest account status' is set to 'Disabled'
Verifies built-in guest account does not exist

metadata.title: Limit Blank Passwords
metadata.description: Local accounts with blank passwords must be restricted to prevent access from the network.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Accounts: Limit local account use of blank passwords to console logon only' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Rename Built-in Administrator Account
metadata.description: The built-in administrator account must be renamed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Accounts: Rename administrator account' is set to a value other than 'Administrator'
Verifies 'Accounts: Rename administrator account' is set to a value other than 'Administrator'

metadata.title: Rename Built-in Guest Account
metadata.description: The built-in guest account must be renamed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Accounts: Rename guest account' is set to a value other than 'Guest'
Verifies 'Accounts: Rename guest account' is set to a value other than 'Guest'
Verifies built-in guest account does not exist

metadata.title: Audit Access of Global System Objects
metadata.description: Auditing Access of Global System Objects must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Audit: Audit the access of global system objects' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Audit Backup and Restore Privileges
metadata.description: Auditing of Backup and Restore Privileges must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Audit: Audit the use of Backup and Restore privilege' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Audit Policy Subcategory Setting
metadata.description: Audit policy using subcategories must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Audit: Force audit policy subcategory settings (Windows Vista or later) to override audit policy category settings' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Format and Eject Removable Media
metadata.description: Ejection of removable NTFS media must be restricted to Administrators.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Devices: Allowed to Format and Eject Removable Media' is set to 'Administrators'

metadata.title: Encrypting and Signing of Secure Channel Traffic
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic must be encrypted or signed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain member: Digitally encrypt or sign secure channel data (always)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Encryption of Secure Channel Traffic
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic must be encrypted when possible.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain member: Digitally encrypt secure channel data (when possible)' is set to 'Enabled'
Verifies 'Domain member: Digitally encrypt or sign secure channel data (always)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Signing of Secure Channel Traffic
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic must be signed when possible.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain member: Digitally sign secure channel data (when possible)' is set to 'Enabled'
Verifies 'Domain member: Digitally encrypt or sign secure channel data (always)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Computer Account Password Reset
metadata.description: The computer account password must not be prevented from being reset.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain member: Disable machine account password changes' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Maximum Machine Account Password Age
metadata.description: The maximum age for machine account passwords must be set to requirements.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain member: Maximum machine account password age' is set to '30' days or less
Verifies 'Domain member: Maximum machine account password age' is not set to '0'

metadata.title: Strong Session Key
metadata.description: The system must be configured to require a strong session key.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Domain member: Require strong (Windows 2000 or later) session key' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Display of Last User Name
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent the display of the last username on the logon screen.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Interactive logon: Do not display last user name' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Ctrl+Alt+Del Security Attention Sequence
metadata.description: The Ctrl+Alt+Del security attention sequence for logons must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Interactive logon: Do not require CTRL+ALT+DEL' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Password Expiration Warning
metadata.description: Users must be warned in advance of their passwords expiring.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Interactive logon: Prompt user to change password before expiration' is set for '14' days or more

metadata.title: Domain Controller authentication for unlock
metadata.description: Domain Controller authentication must not be required to unlock the workstation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Interactive logon: Require Domain Controller authentication to unlock workstation' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Smart Card Removal Option
metadata.description: The Smart Card removal option must be configured to Force Logoff or Lock Workstation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Interactive logon: Smart card removal behavior' is set to 'Lock Workstation'
Verifies 'Interactive logon: Smart card removal behavior' is set to 'Force Logoff'

metadata.title: SMB Client Packet Signing (Always)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB client must be configured to always perform SMB packet signing.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft Network Client: Digitally sign communications (always)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: SMB Client Packet Signing (if server agrees)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB client must be enabled to perform SMB packet signing when possible.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft network client: Digitally sign communications (if server agrees)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Unencrypted Password is Sent to SMB Server
metadata.description: Unencrypted passwords must not be sent to a third-party SMB Server.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft Network Client: Send unencrypted password to connect to third-party SMB servers' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Idle Time Before Suspending a Session.
metadata.description: The amount of idle time required before suspending a session must be properly set.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft network server: Amount of idle time required before suspending session' is set to '15' minutes or less

metadata.title: SMB Server Packet Signing (Always)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB server must be configured to always perform SMB packet signing.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft network server: Digitally sign communications (always)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: SMB Server Packet Signing (if client agrees)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB server must perform SMB packet signing when possible.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft network server: Digitally sign communications (if client agrees)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Forcibly Disconnect when Logon Hours Expire
metadata.description: Users must be forcibly disconnected when their logon hours expire.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft network server: Disconnect clients when logon hours expire' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Restrict Anonymous SAM Enumeration
metadata.description: Anonymous enumeration of SAM accounts must not be allowed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Do not allow anonymous enumeration of SAM accounts' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Restrict Anonymous Network Shares
metadata.description: Anonymous enumeration of shares must be restricted.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Do not allow anonymous enumeration of SAM accounts and shares' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Storage of Passwords and Credentials
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent the storage of passwords and credentials.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Do not allow storage of credentials or .NET Passports for network authentication' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Everyone Anonymous Rights
metadata.description: The system must not be configured to give anonymous users Everyone rights.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Let Everyone permissions apply to anonymous users' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Anonymous Access to Named Pipes
metadata.description: Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Named Pipes that can be accessed anonymously' is configured to contain no values

metadata.title: Remotely Accessible Registry Paths
metadata.description: Unauthorized registry paths must not be remotely accessible.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths' is configured to contain authorized registry paths
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths' is configured with no entries
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths' is not configured

metadata.title: Remotely Accessible Registry Paths and Sub-Paths
metadata.description: Unauthorized remotely accessible registry paths and sub-paths must not be configured.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths and sub paths' is configured to contain authorized registry paths
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths and sub paths' is configured but contains no entries
Verifies 'Network access: Remotely accessible registry paths and sub paths' is not configured

metadata.title: Anonymous Access to Named Pipes and Shares
metadata.description: Anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares must be restricted.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Anonymous Access to Network Shares
metadata.description: Unauthorized shares must not be accessed anonymously.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Shares that can be accessed anonymously' is blank
Verifies 'Network access: Shares that can be accessed anonymously' is not configured

metadata.title: Sharing and Security Model for Local Accounts
metadata.description: The system must be configured to use the Classic security model.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network access: Sharing and security model for local accounts' is set to 'Classic - local users authenticate as themselves'

metadata.title: LAN Manager Hash Value Stored
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent the storage of the LAN Manager hash of passwords.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: Do not store LAN Manager hash value on next password change' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Force Logoff When Logon Hours Expire
metadata.description: The system must be configured to force users to log off when their allowed logon hours expire.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: Force logoff when logon hours expire' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: LanMan Authentication Level
metadata.description: The LanMan authentication level must be set to send NTLMv2 response only, and to refuse LM and NTLM.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: LAN Manager authentication level' is set to 'Send NTLMv2 response only. Refuse LM & NTLM' (Level 5)

metadata.title: LDAP Client Signing
metadata.description: Network Security: LDAP client signing requirements

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: LDAP client signing requirements' is set to at a minimum 'Negotiate signing'

metadata.title: Recovery Console - Automatic Logon
metadata.description: The Recovery Console option must be set to prevent automatic logon to the system.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Recovery console: Allow automatic administrative logon' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Recovery Console - SET Command
metadata.description: The Recovery Console SET command must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Recovery console: Allow floppy copy and access to all drives and folders' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Display Shutdown Button
metadata.description: The shutdown option must be available from the logon dialog box.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Shutdown: Allow system to be shutdown without having to log on' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: FIPS Compliant Algorithms
metadata.description: The system must be configured to use FIPS-compliant algorithms for encryption, hashing, and signing.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'System cryptography: Use FIPS compliant algorithms for encryption, hashing, and signing' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Case Insensitivity for Non-Windows
metadata.description: The system must be configured to require case insensitivity for non-Windows subsystems.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'System objects: Require case insensitivity for non-Windows subsystems' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Global System Objects Permission Strength
metadata.description: The default permissions of global system objects must be increased.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'System objects: Strengthen default permissions of internal system objects (e.g. Symbolic Links)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: UAC - Admin Approval Mode
metadata.description: User Account Control approval mode for the built-in Administrator must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Admin Approval Mode for the Built-in Administrator account' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: UAC - Admin Elevation Prompt
metadata.description: User Account Control must, at minimum, prompt administrators for consent on the secure desktop.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Prompt for consent on the secure desktop'
Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Prompt for credentials on the secure desktop'

metadata.title: UAC - User Elevation Prompt
metadata.description: User Account Control must, at minimum, prompt users for credentials on the secure desktop.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for standard users' is set to 'Prompt for credentials on the secure desktop'
Verifies 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for standard users' is set to 'Automatically deny elevation requests'

metadata.title: UAC - Application Installations
metadata.description: User Account Control must be configured to detect application installations and prompt for elevation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Detect application installations and prompt for elevation' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: UAC - Application Elevations
metadata.description: Windows must elevate all applications in User Account Control, not just signed ones.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Only elevate executables that are signed and validated' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: UAC - UIAccess Application Elevation
metadata.description: User Account Control must only elevate UIAccess applications that are installed in secure locations.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Only elevate UIAccess applications that are installed in secure locations' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: UAC - All Admin Approval Mode
metadata.description: User Account Control must run all administrators in Admin Approval Mode, enabling UAC.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Run all administrators in Admin Approval Mode' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: UAC - Secure Desktop Mode
metadata.description: User Account Control must switch to the secure desktop when prompting for elevation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Switch to the secure desktop when prompting for elevation' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: UAC - Non UAC Compliant Application Virtualization
metadata.description: User Account Control must virtualize file and registry write failures to per-user locations.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'User Account Control: Virtualize file and registry write failures to per-user locations' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Disable IP Source Routing
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent IP source routing.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'

metadata.title: Disable ICMP Redirect
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent ICMP redirects from overriding OSPF generated routes.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (EnableICMPRedirect) Allow ICMP redirects to override OSPF generated routes' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: TCP Connection Keep-Alive Time
metadata.description: The system must be configured to limit how often keep-alive packets are sent.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (KeepAliveTime) How often keep-alive packets are sent in milliseconds' is set to '300000 or 5 minutes (recommended)' or less

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Password Prompting
metadata.description: Remote Desktop Services must always prompt a client for passwords upon connection.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Always prompt for password upon connection' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Set Encryption Level
metadata.description: Remote Desktop Services must be configured with the client connection encryption set to the required level.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Set client connection encryption level' is set to 'Enabled' and 'High Level'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Do Not Use Temp Folders
metadata.description: Remote Desktop Services must be configured to use session-specific temporary folders.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not use temporary folders per session' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Delete Temp Folders
metadata.description: Remote Desktop Services must delete temporary folders when a session is terminated.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not delete temp folder upon exit' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Disable Router Discovery
metadata.description: The system must be configured to disable the Internet Router Discovery Protocol (IRDP).

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (PerformRouterDiscovery) Allow IRDP to detect and configure Default Gateway addresses (could lead to DoS)' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Safe DLL Search Mode
metadata.description: The system must be configured to use Safe DLL Search Mode.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (SafeDllSearchMode) Enable Safe DLL search mode (recommended)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Screen Saver Grace Period
metadata.description: The system must be configured to have password protection take effect within a limited time frame when the screen saver becomes active.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (ScreenSaverGracePeriod) The time in seconds before the screen saver grace period expires (0 recommended)' is set to 5 or less

metadata.title: TCP Data Retransmissions
metadata.description: The system must limit how many times unacknowledged TCP data is retransmitted.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (TcpMaxDataRetransmissions) How many times unacknowledged data is retransmitted (3 recommended, 5 is the default)' is set to 3 or less

metadata.title: Audit Log Warning Level
metadata.description: The system must generate an audit event when the audit log reaches a percentage of full threshold.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (WarningLevel) Percentage threshold for the security event log at which the system will generate a warning' is set to 90 percent or less

metadata.title: Session Security for NTLM SSP Based Servers
metadata.description: The system must be configured to meet the minimum session security requirement for NTLM SSP based servers.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) servers' is set to 'Require NTLMv2 session security'
Verifies 'Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) servers' is set to 'Require 128-bit encryption'

metadata.title: Session Security for NTLM SSP Based Clients
metadata.description: The system must be configured to meet the minimum session security requirement for NTLM SSP based clients.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) clients' is set to 'Require NTLMv2 session security'
Verifies 'Network security: Minimum session security for NTLM SSP based (including secure RPC) clients' is set to 'Require 128-bit encryption'

metadata.title: Windows Peer to Peer Networking
metadata.description: Windows Peer-to-Peer networking services must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn Off Microsoft Peer-to-Peer Networking Services' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Prohibit Network Bridge
metadata.description: Network Bridges must be prohibited in Windows.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prohibit installation and configuration of Network Bridge on your DNS domain network' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Elevate when setting a network’s location
metadata.description: Domain users must be required to elevate when setting a network’s location.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require domain users to elevate when setting a network's location' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Direct Access - Route Through Internal Network
metadata.description: All Direct Access traffic must be routed through the internal network.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Route all traffic through the internal network' is set to 'Enabled: Enabled State'

metadata.title: 6to4 State
metadata.description: The 6to4 IPv6 transition technology must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Set 6to4 State' is set to 'Enabled: Disabled State'

metadata.title: ISATAP State
metadata.description: The ISATAP IPv6 transition technology must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'ISATAP State' is set to 'Enabled: Disabled State'

metadata.title: Teredo State
metadata.description: The Teredo IPv6 transition technology must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Teredo State' is set to 'Enabled: Disabled State'

metadata.title: IP-HTTPS State
metadata.description: The IP-HTTPS IPv6 transition technology must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'IP-HTTPS URL:' is not null
Verifies 'IP-HTTPS State' is set to 'Enabled: Disabled State'

metadata.title: Network - Windows Connect Now Wizards
metadata.description: The Windows Connect Now wizards must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prohibit Access of the Windows Connect Now wizards' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Windows Update Point and Print Driver Search
metadata.description: Windows Update must be prevented from searching for point and print drivers.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Extend Point and Print connection to search Windows Update' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Device Install - PnP Interface Remote Access
metadata.description: Remote access to the Plug and Play interface must be disabled for device installation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow remote access to the Plug and Play interface' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Device Install - Generic Driver Error Report
metadata.description: An Error Report must not be sent when a generic device driver is installed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not send a Windows error report when a generic driver is installed on a device' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Device Install - Drivers System Restore Point
metadata.description: A system restore point must be created when a new device driver is installed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent creation of a system restore point during device activity that would normally prompt creation of a restore point' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Prevent device metadata retrieval from Internet
metadata.description: Device metadata retrieval from the Internet must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent device metadata retrieval from internet' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Prevent Windows Update for device driver search
metadata.description: Device driver searches using Windows Update must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify search order for device driver source locations' is set to 'Enabled: Do not search Windows Update'

metadata.title: HTTP Printer Drivers
metadata.description: Downloading print driver packages over HTTP must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off downloading of print drivers over HTTP' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Handwriting personalization data sharing
metadata.description: Handwriting personalization data sharing with Microsoft must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off handwriting personalization data sharing' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Handwriting Recognition Error Reporting
metadata.description: Errors in handwriting recognition on Tablet PCs must not be reported to Microsoft.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off handwriting recognition error reporting' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Internet Connection Wizard ISP Downloads
metadata.description: The Internet Connection Wizard must not download a list of Internet Service Providers (ISPs) from Microsoft.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Internet Connection Wizard if URL connection is referring to Microsoft.com' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Internet Download / Online Ordering
metadata.description: Web publishing and online ordering wizards must be prevented from downloading a list of providers.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Internet download for Web publishing and online ordering wizards' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Internet File Association Service
metadata.description: The Internet File Association service must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Internet File Association service' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Printing Over HTTP
metadata.description: Printing over HTTP must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off printing over HTTP' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Windows Registration Wizard
metadata.description: Windows Registration Wizard must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Registration if URL connection is referring to Microsoft.com' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Search Companion Content File Updates
metadata.description: Search Companion must be prevented from automatically downloading content updates.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Search Companion content file updates' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Order Prints Online
metadata.description: The Order Prints Online wizard must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off the 'Order Prints' picture task' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Publish to Web
metadata.description: File and folder Publish to Web option must be unavailable in Windows folders.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off the 'Publish to Web' task for files and folders' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Windows Messenger Experience Improvement
metadata.description: Windows Messenger must be prevented from collecting anonymous information about how the service is used.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off the Windows Messenger Customer Experience Improvement Program' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Error Reporting - Report Errors
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent automatic forwarding of error information.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Windows Error Reporting' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Windows Update Device Drive Searching
metadata.description: Windows must be prevented from using Windows Update to search for drivers.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Windows Update device driver searching' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Classic Logon
metadata.description: The classic logon screen must be required for user logons.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Always use classic logon' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Power Mgmt - Password Wake on Battery
metadata.description: Users must be prompted for a password on resume from sleep (on battery).

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require a password when a computer wakes (on battery)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Power Mgmt - Password Wake When Plugged In
metadata.description: The user must be prompted for a password on resume from sleep (plugged in).

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require a password when a computer wakes (plugged in)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Remote Assistance - Offer Remote Assistance
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent unsolicited remote assistance offers.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Configure Offer Remote Assistance' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Remote Assistance - Solicit Remote Assistance
metadata.description: Solicited Remote Assistance must not be allowed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Configure Solicited Remote Assistance' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Remote Assistance - Session Logging
metadata.description: Remote Assistance log files must be generated.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn on session logging' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: RPC - Unauthenticated RPC Clients
metadata.description: Unauthenticated RPC clients must be restricted from connecting to the RPC server.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Restrict Unauthenticated RPC clients' is set to 'Enabled' and 'Authenticated'

metadata.title: RPC - Endpoint Mapper Authentication
metadata.description: Client computers must be required to authenticate for RPC communication.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Enable RPC Endpoint Mapper Client Authentication' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: MSDT Interactive Communication
metadata.description: Microsoft Support Diagnostic Tool (MSDT) interactive communication with Microsoft must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft Support Diagnostic Tool: Turn on MSDT interactive communication with Support Provider' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Windows Online Troubleshooting Service
metadata.description: Access to Windows Online Troubleshooting Service (WOTS) must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Troubleshooting: Allow users to access online troubleshooting content on Microsoft servers from the Troubleshooting Control Panel (via Windows Online Troubleshooting Service - WOTS)' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Disable PerfTrack
metadata.description: Responsiveness events must be prevented from being aggregated and sent to Microsoft.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Enable/Disable PerfTrack' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Application Compatibility Program Inventory
metadata.description: The Application Compatibility Program Inventory must be prevented from collecting data and sending the information to Microsoft.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Inventory Collector' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Default Autorun Behavior
metadata.description: The default autorun behavior must be configured to prevent autorun commands.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Default behavior for AutoRun' is set to 'Enabled:Do not execute any autorun commands'

metadata.title: Disable Media Autoplay
metadata.description: Autoplay must be disabled for all drives.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off AutoPlay' is set to 'Enabled:All Drives'

metadata.title: Autoplay for non-volume devices
metadata.description: Autoplay must be turned off for non-volume devices.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Disallow Autoplay for non-volume devices' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Enumerate Administrator Accounts on Elevation
metadata.description: The system must require username and password to elevate a running application.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Enumerate administrator accounts on elevation' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Maximum Log Size - Application
metadata.description: The Application event log must be configured to a minimum size requirement.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify the maximum log size (KB)' is set at a minimum to 'Enabled:32768'

metadata.title: Maximum Log Size - Security
metadata.description: The Security event log must be configured to a minimum size requirement.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify the maximum log size (KB)' is set at a minimum to 'Enabled:81920'

metadata.title: Maximum Log Size - Setup
metadata.description: The Setup event log must be configured to a minimum size requirement.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify the maximum log size (KB)' is set at a minimum to 'Enabled:32768'

metadata.title: Maximum Log Size - System
metadata.description: The System event log must be configured to a minimum size requirement.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify the maximum log size (KB)' is set at a minimum to 'Enabled:32768'

metadata.title: Game Explorer Information Downloads
metadata.description: Game explorer information must not be downloaded from Windows Metadata Services.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off downloading of game information' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Turn Off Game Updates
metadata.description: Downloading of game update information must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off game updates' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Prevent Joining Homegroup
metadata.description: The system must be prevented from joining a homegroup.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent the computer from joining a homegroup' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Prevent Password Saving
metadata.description: Passwords must not be saved in the Remote Desktop Client.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not allow passwords to be saved' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Search - Encrypted Files Indexing
metadata.description: Indexing of encrypted files must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow indexing of encrypted files' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Search - Exchange Folder Indexing
metadata.description: Indexing of mail items in Exchange Folder when Outlook is running in uncached mode must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Enable indexing uncached Exchange folders' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Defender - SpyNet Reporting
metadata.description: Windows Defender SpyNet membership must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Configure Microsoft Active Protection Service Reporting' is not configured
Verifies 'Configure Microsoft Active Protection Service Reporting' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Error Reporting - Logging
metadata.description: Error Reporting events must be logged in the system event log.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Disable Logging' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Error Reporting - Additional Data
metadata.description: Additional data requests in response to Error Reporting must be declined.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not send additional data' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Explorer Data Execution Prevention
metadata.description: Explorer Data Execution Prevention must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Data Execution Prevention for Explorer' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Windows Explorer - Heap Termination
metadata.description: Turning off File Explorer heap termination on corruption must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off heap termination on corruption' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Windows Explorer - Shell Protocol Protected Mode
metadata.description: File Explorer shell protocol must run in protected mode.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off shell protocol protected mode' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Windows Installer - Vendor Signed Updates
metadata.description: Non-administrators must be prevented from applying vendor-signed updates.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prohibit non-administrators from applying vendor signed updates' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Logon - Report Logon Server
metadata.description: Users must be notified if the logon server was inaccessible and cached credentials were used.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Report when logon server was not available during user logon' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Media Player - Disable Automatic Updates
metadata.description: Media Player must be configured to prevent automatic checking for updates.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent Automatic Updates' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Audit - Credential Validation - Failure
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Logon - Credential Validation failures.

criterion.comment: Audit - Credential Validation - Failure only
Audit - Credential Validation - Success and Failure

metadata.title: Audit - Credential Validation - Success
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Logon - Credential Validation successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Credential Validation - Success only
Audit - Credential Validation - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Other Account Management Events failures.

criteria.comment: Audit - Other Account Management Events - Failure

criterion.comment: Audit - Other Account Management Events - Failure only
Audit - Other Account Management Events - Success and Failure

metadata.title: Audit - Other Account Management - Success
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Other Account Management Events successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Other Account Management - Success only
Audit - Other Account Management - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Security Group Management failures.

Audit - Security Group Management - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Security Group Management successes.

Audit - User Account Management - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Detailed Tracking - Process Creation successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Process Creation - Success only
Audit - Process Creation - Success and Failure

criterion.comment: Audit - Logoff - Success only
Audit - Logoff - Success and Failure

metadata.title: Audit - Logon - Failure
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Logon/Logoff - Logon failures.

criterion.comment: Audit - Logon - Failure only
Audit - Logon - Success and Failure

metadata.title: Audit - Logon - Success
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Logon/Logoff - Logon successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Logon - Success only
Audit - Logon - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Logon/Logoff - Special Logon successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Special Logon - Success only
Audit - Special Logon - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Object Access - File System failures.

criterion.comment: Audit - File System - Failure only
Audit - File System - Success and Failure

metadata.title: Audit - Registry - Failure
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Object Access - Registry failures.

criterion.comment: Audit - Registry - Failure only
Audit - Registry - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Policy Change - Audit Policy Change failures.

criterion.comment: Audit - Audit Policy Change - Failure only
Audit - Audit Policy Change - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Policy Change - Audit Policy Change successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Audit Policy Change - Success only
Audit - Audit Policy Change - Success and Failure

metadata.title: Audit - Authentication Policy Change - Success
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Policy Change - Authentication Policy Change successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Authentication Policy Change - Success only
Audit - Authentication Policy Change - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Privilege Use - Sensitive Privilege Use failures.

criterion.comment: Audit - Sensitive Privilege Use - Failure only
Audit - Sensitive Privilege Use - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Privilege Use - Sensitive Privilege Use successes.

criterion.comment: Audit - Sensitive Privilege Use - Success only
Audit - Sensitive Privilege Use - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - IPsec Driver failures.

criterion.comment: Audit - IPSec Driver - Failure only
Audit - IPSec Driver - Success and Failure

metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - System Integrity successes.

Audit - System Integrity - Success and Failure

metadata.title: Built-in Admin Account Status
metadata.description: The built-in administrator account must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Accounts: Administrator account status' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: SPN Target Name Validation Level
metadata.description: The service principal name (SPN) target name validation level must be configured to Accept if provided by client.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Microsoft network server: Server SPN target name validation level' is set to 'Accept if provided by client'

metadata.title: IPv6 Source Routing
metadata.description: IPv6 source routing must be configured to the highest protection level.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (DisableIPSourceRouting IPv6) IP source routing protection level (protects against packet spoofing)' is set to 'Highest protection, source routing is completely disabled'

metadata.title: Hide Computer
metadata.description: The system must be configured to hide the computer from the browse list.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (Hidden) Hide computer from the browse list (Not Recommended except for highly secure environments' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: IPv6 TCP Data Retransmissions
metadata.description: IPv6 TCP data retransmissions must be configured to prevent resources from becoming exhausted.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'MSS: (TcpMaxDataRetransmissions IPv6) How many times unacknowledged data is retransmitted (3 recommended, 5 is the default)' is set to '3' or less

metadata.title: Computer Identity Authentication for NTLM
metadata.description: Services using Local System that use negotiate when reverting to NTLM authentication must use the computer identity vs. authenticating anonymously.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network Security: Allow Local System to use computer identity for NTLM' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: NTLM NULL Session Fallback
metadata.description: NTLM must be prevented from falling back to a Null session.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network security: Allow LocalSystem NULL session fallback' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: PKU2U Online Identities Authentication
metadata.description: PKU2U authentication using online identities must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network Security: Allow PKU2U authentication requests to this computer to use online identities' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Kerberos Encryption Types
metadata.description: Kerberos encryption types must be configured to prevent the use of DES encryption suites.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Network Security: Configure encryption types allowed for Kerberos' is set to 'Enabled' with 'RC4_HMAC_MD5', 'AES128_HMAC_SHA1', 'AES256_HMAC_SHA1', 'Future encryption types'

metadata.title: UR: Act as part of the operating system
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Act as part of the operating system user right.

criterion.comment: Act as part of the operating system - None

metadata.title: UR: Allow log on through Remote Desktop Services
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Allow log on through Remote Desktop Services user right.

criterion.comment: Allow log on through Remote Desktop Services - None

metadata.title: UR: Create a token object
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Create a token object user right.

criterion.comment: Create a token object - None

metadata.title: UR: Create permanent shared objects
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Create permanent shared objects user right.

criterion.comment: Create permanent shared objects - None

metadata.title: UR: Debug Programs
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Debug programs user right.

criterion.comment: Debug Programs - Administrators

metadata.title: UR: Deny access to this computer from the network
metadata.description: The Deny access to this computer from the network user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

extend_definition.comment: Deny access to this computer from the network - Non-Domain Systems
Deny access to this computer from the network - Domain Joined Systems

metadata.title: UR: Deny access to this computer from the network - Non-Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny access to this computer from the network user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
Deny access to this computer from the network - Guests

metadata.title: UR: Deny access to this computer from the network - Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny access to this computer from the network user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is a member of a domain
Deny access to this computer from the network - Guests
Deny access to this computer from the network - Domain Admins
Deny access to this computer from the network - Enterprise Admins

criteria.comment: Deny access to this computer from the network - Local Administrator Accounts
DenyNetworkAccess group is denied and all local admins are in the group

criterion.comment: Deny access to this computer from the network - DenyNetworkAccess Group
All Local Administrators are included in the DenyNetworkAccess Group

criteria.comment: Built-in administrator account and other local admins are denied access to this computer from the network

criterion.comment: Deny access to this computer from the network - Built-in Administrator
Deny access to this computer from the network - Other Local Administrators
Deny access to this computer from the network - Local account and member of Administrators group
Deny access to this computer from the network - Local account

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a batch job
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a batch job user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

notes.note: This check for the Deny log on as a batch will return an Unknown with Policy Auditor 5.3 due a case sensitivity issue with user right name as defined in the schema - sedenybatchLogonright.

extend_definition.comment: Deny log on as a batch job - Non-Domain Systems
Deny log on as a batch job - Domain Joined Systems

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a batch job - Non-Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a batch job user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
Deny log on as a batch job - Guests

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a batch job - Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a batch job user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is a member of a domain
Deny log on as a batch job - Guests
Deny log on as a batch job - Domain Admins
Deny log on as a batch job - Enterprise Admins

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a service
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a service user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems. No other groups or accounts must be assigned this right.

extend_definition.comment: Deny log on as a service - Non-Domain Systems
Deny log on as a service - Domain Joined Systems

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a service - Non-Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a service user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems. No other groups or accounts must be assigned this right.

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
Deny log on as a service - Guests

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a service - Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a service user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems. No other groups or accounts must be assigned this right.

criterion.comment: System is a member of a domain
Deny log on as a service - Guests
Deny log on as a service - Domain Admins
Deny log on as a service - Enterprise Admins

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on locally
metadata.description: The Deny log on locally user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

extend_definition.comment: Deny log on locally - Non-Domain Systems
Deny log on locally - Domain Joined Systems

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on locally - Non-Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on locally user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
Deny log on locally - Guests

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on locally - Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on locally user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is a member of a domain
Deny log on locally - Guests
Deny log on locally - Domain Admins
Deny log on locally - Enterprise Admins

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services
metadata.description: The Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

extend_definition.comment: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Non-Domain Systems
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Domain Joined Systems

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Non-Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Guests

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Domain Systems
metadata.description: The Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems.

criterion.comment: System is a member of a domain
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Guests
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Domain Admins
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Enterprise Admins

criteria.comment: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Local Administrator Accounts
DenyNetworkAccess group is denied and all local admins are in the group

criterion.comment: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - DenyNetworkAccess Group
All Local Administrators are included in the DenyNetworkAccess Group

criteria.comment: Built-in administrator account and other local admins are denied access to this computer from the network

criterion.comment: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Built-in Administrator
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Other Local Administrators
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Local Account and member of Administrators group
Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Local Account

metadata.title: UR: Enable computer and user accounts to be trusted for delegation
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Enable computer and user accounts to be trusted for delegation user right.

criterion.comment: Enable computer and user accounts to be trusted for delegation - None

metadata.title: UR: Lock pages in memory
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Lock pages in memory user right.

criterion.comment: Lock pages in memory - None

metadata.title: UR: Log on as a batch job
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Log on as a batch job user right.

criterion.comment: Log on as a batch job - None

metadata.title: UR: Log on as a service
metadata.description: Unauthorized users must not have the Log on as a service user right.

criterion.comment: Log on as a service - None

metadata.title: UR: Modify an object label
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Modify an object label user right.

criterion.comment: Modify an object label - None

metadata.title: UR: Replace a process level token
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Replace a process level token user right.

criterion.comment: Replace a process level token - Local Service, Network Service

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000014
metadata.description: Simultaneous connections to the Internet or a Windows domain must be limited.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Minimize the number of simultaneous connections to the Internet or a Windows Domain' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000015
metadata.description: Connections to non-domain networks when connected to a domain authenticated network must be blocked.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prohibit connection to non-domain networks when connected to domain authenticated network' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000018
metadata.description: Optional component installation and component repair must be prevented from using Windows Update.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify settings for optional component installation and component repair' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Never attempt to download payload from Windows Update' selected

metadata.title: Device Install Software Request Error Report
metadata.description: Windows must be prevented from sending an error report when a device driver requests additional software during installation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent Windows from sending an error report when a device driver requests additional software during installation' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000025
metadata.description: Device driver updates must only search managed servers, not Windows Update.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Specify the search server for device driver updates' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Search Managed Server' selected

metadata.title: WINCC-000027
metadata.description: Early Launch Antimalware, Boot-Start Driver Initialization Policy must be enabled and configured to only Good and Unknown.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Boot-Start Driver Initialization Policy' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Good and Unknown' selected

metadata.title: WINCC-000030
metadata.description: Access to the Windows Store must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off access to the Store' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000048
metadata.description: Copying of user input methods to the system account for sign-in must be prevented.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Disallow copying of user input methods to the system account for sign-in' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000050
metadata.description: Connected users on domain-joined computers must not be enumerated.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not enumerate connected users on domain-joined computers' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000051
metadata.description: Local users on domain-joined computers must not be enumerated.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Enumerate local users on domain-joined computers' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000052
metadata.description: App notifications on the lock screen must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off app notifications on the lock screen' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000053
metadata.description: Signing in using a PIN must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn on PIN sign-in' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000056
metadata.description: The display must turn off after 20 minutes of inactivity when the system is running on battery.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn Off the Display (On Battery)' is set to 'Enabled' with '1200' seconds or less

metadata.title: WINCC-000057
metadata.description: The display must turn off after 20 minutes of inactivity when the system is plugged in.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn Off the Display (Plugged In)' is set to 'Enabled' with '1200' seconds or less

metadata.title: WINCC-000065
metadata.description: The detection of compatibility issues for applications and drivers must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Detect compatibility issues for applications and drivers' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000070
metadata.description: Trusted app installation must be enabled to allow for signed enterprise line of business apps.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow all trusted apps to install' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000075
metadata.description: The use of biometrics must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Detect compatibility issues for applications and drivers' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000076
metadata.description: The password reveal button must not be displayed.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do not display the password reveal button' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000088
metadata.description: The Windows SmartScreen must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Configure Windows SmartScreen' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Turn off SmartScreen' selected

metadata.title: WINCC-000095
metadata.description: The location feature must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off location' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: RSS Attachment Downloads
metadata.description: Attachments must be prevented from being downloaded from RSS feeds.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent downloading of enclosures' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000109
metadata.description: Automatic download of updates from the Windows Store must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Automatic Download of updates' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000110
metadata.description: The Windows Store application must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off the Store application' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Windows Installer - User Control
metadata.description: Users must be prevented from changing installation options.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Enable user control over installs' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Always Install with Elevated Privileges Disabled
metadata.description: The Windows Installer Always install with elevated privileges must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Always install with elevated privileges' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Windows Installer - IE Security Prompt
metadata.description: Users must be notified if a web-based program attempts to install software.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent Internet Explorer security prompt for Windows Installer scripts' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000123
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) client must not use Basic authentication.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow Basic authentication' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000124
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) client must not allow unencrypted traffic.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow unencrypted traffic' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000125
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) client must not use Digest authentication.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Disallow Digest authentication' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000126
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) service must not use Basic authentication.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow Basic authentication' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000127
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) service must not allow unencrypted traffic.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Allow unencrypted traffic' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000128
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) service must not store RunAs credentials.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Disallow WinRM from storing RunAs credentials' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Secure RPC Connection
metadata.description: The Remote Desktop Session Host must require secure RPC communications.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Require secure RPC communication' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Unsupported Service Packs
metadata.description: Systems must be maintained at a supported service pack level.

criterion.comment: Verifies the OS Version is equal to or greater than 6.2
Verifies the OS Build is equal to or greater than 9200

metadata.title: WN08-RG-000003
metadata.description: Local administrator accounts must have their privileged token filtered to prevent elevated privileges from being used over the network on domain systems.

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
Verifies local admin accounts filtered token policy is enabled on domain systems

metadata.title: Disable Automatic Logon
metadata.description: Automatic logons must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Verifes 'MSS: (AutoAdminLogon) Enable Automatic Logon (not recommended)' is set to 'Disabled'
Verifies the automatic logon password registry value (DefaultPassword) does not exist

metadata.title: WINCC-000078
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) system-wide Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) must be enabled and configured to Application Opt In.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'System ASLR' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt In' selected

metadata.title: WINCC-000079
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) Default Protections for Internet Explorer must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Default Protections for Internet Explorer' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000080
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) Default Protections for Recommended Software must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Default Protections for Recommended Software' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000081
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) Default Protections for Popular Software must be enabled.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Default Protections for Popular Software' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WINCC-000082
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) system-wide Data Execution Prevention (DEP) must be enabled and configured to at least Application Opt Out.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'System DEP' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt Out' selected
Verifies 'System DEP' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Always On' selected

metadata.title: WINCC-000083
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) system-wide Structured Exception Handler Overwrite Protection (SEHOP) must be configured to Application Opt Out.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'System SEHOP' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt Out' selected

metadata.title: WINGE-000100
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) must be installed on the system.

criterion.comment: Verifies EMET is installed
Verifies EMET 4.1 Update 1 or higher is installed

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000060
metadata.description: Remote assistance must display a warning message when allowing helpdesk personnel to control a system.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Customize warning messages' is set to 'Enabled' with 'You are about to allow other personnel to remotely control your system. You must monitor the activity until the session is closed.' entered in the 'Display warning message before sharing control:' field

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000061
metadata.description: Remote assistance must display a warning message when allowing helpdesk personnel to connect to a system.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Customize warning messages' is set to 'Enabled' with 'You are about to allow other personnel to remotely connect to your system. Sensitive data should not be displayed during this session.' entered in the 'Display warning message before connecting:' field

metadata.title: WINGE-000200
metadata.description: A group named DenyNetworkAccess must be defined on domain systems to include all local administrator accounts.

criterion.comment: System is not a member of a domain
Verifies the DenyNetworkAccess group exists
Verifies all Local Administrators are included in the DenyNetworkAccess Group
Verifies Windows.1 or above is installed

metadata.title: Software Certificate Installation Files
metadata.description: Software certificate installation files must be removed from a system.

criterion.comment: Verifies certificate installation files (*.p12 and *.pfx) are not present on the system

metadata.title: Event Viewer Events.asp Links
metadata.description: Event Viewer Events.asp links must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn off Event Viewer ''Events.asp'' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Caching of logon credentials
metadata.description: Caching of logon credentials must be limited.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Interactive Logon: Number of previous logons to cache (in case domain controller is not available)' is set to '4' logons or less

metadata.title: Media DRM - Internet Access
metadata.description: Windows Media Digital Rights Management must be prevented from accessing the Internet.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Prevent Windows Media DRM Internet Access' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Media Player - First Use Dialog Boxes
metadata.description: Users must not be presented with Privacy and Installation options on first use of Windows Media Player.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Do Not Show First Use Dialog Boxes' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000017
metadata.description: Users must only be allowed to point and print to machines in their forest.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Point and Print Restrictions' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Users can only point and print to machines in their forest' selected
Verifies 'When installing Drivers for a new connection' is set to 'Do not show warning or elevation prompt'
Verifies 'When updating drivers for an existing connection' is set to 'Do not show warning or elevation prompt'

metadata.title: WINCC-000106
metadata.description: Basic authentication for RSS feeds over HTTP must be turned off.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Turn on Basic feed authentication over HTTP' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Windows Firewall Domain - Log Dropped Packets
metadata.description: The Windows Firewall with Advanced Security must log dropped packets when connected to a domain.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Log dropped packets' is set to 'Yes'

metadata.title: Logged Successful Connections
metadata.description: The "Log Successful Connections" option for the Windows Firewall should be configured correctly for the Domain Profile.

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\DomainProfile\Logging!LogSuccessfulConnections value equals variable

metadata.title: Size Limit
metadata.description: The log file size limit for the Windows Firewall should be configured correctly for the Domain Profile.

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\DomainProfile\Logging!LogFileSize value is greater than or equal to variable

metadata.title: Display a Notification - Domain Profile
metadata.description: Display a Notification - Domain Profile

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\DomainProfile!DisableNotifications value equals variable

metadata.description: Allow Unicast Response - Domain Profile

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\DomainProfile!DisableUnicastResponsesToMulticastBroadcast value equals variable

metadata.description: Firewall state - Domain Profile

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\DomainProfile!EnableFirewall value equals variable

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\DomainProfile!DefaultInboundAction value equals variable

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\WindowsFirewall\DomainProfile!DefaultOutboundAction value equals variable

'Specify the maximum log size (KB)' is set at a minimum to 'Enabled:32768'

'Accounts: Rename administrator account' is set to a value other than 'Administrator'
'Accounts: Rename guest account' is set to a value other than 'Guest'

'Audit: Audit the use of Backup and Restore privilege' is set to 'Disabled'

'Domain member: Digitally encrypt or sign secure channel data (always)' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: CNG security feature bypass vulnerability - CVE-2015-0010 (MS15-010)
metadata.description: The CryptProtectMemory function in cng.sys (aka the Cryptography Next Generation driver) in the kernel-mode drivers in Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, and Windows RT Gold and 8.1, when the CRYPTPROTECTMEMORY_SAME_LOGON option is used, does not check an impersonation token's level, which allows local users to bypass intended decryption restrictions by leveraging a service that (1) has a named-pipe planting vulnerability or (2) uses world-readable shared memory for encrypted data, aka "CNG Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability" or MSRC ID 20707.

metadata.title: Group Policy security feature bypass vulnerability - CVE-2015-0009 (MS15-014)
metadata.description: The Group Policy Security Configuration policy implementation in Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, and Windows RT Gold and 8.1 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to disable a signing requirement and trigger a revert-to-default action by spoofing domain-controller responses, aka "Group Policy Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability."

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Microsoft Schannel could allow security feature bypass - CVE-2015-1637 (MS15-031)
metadata.description: Schannel (aka Secure Channel) in Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, and Windows RT Gold and 8.1 does not properly restrict TLS state transitions, which makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct cipher-downgrade attacks to EXPORT_RSA ciphers via crafted TLS traffic, related to the "FREAK" issue, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-0204 and CVE-2015-1067.

metadata.title: JPEG XR parser information disclosure vulnerability - CVE-2015-0076 (MS15-029)
metadata.description: The photo-decoder implementation in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, and Windows RT Gold and 8.1 does not properly initialize memory for rendering of JXR images, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory via a crafted web site, aka "JPEG XR Parser Information Disclosure Vulnerability."
